niagara.client
Class ConnectionManager

java.lang.Object
  niagara.client.ConnectionManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
QueryExecutionIF
public class ConnectionManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements QueryExecutionIF

This class implements the QueryExecutionIF interface and coordinates the messages that are sent to the server

executeQuery

public int executeQuery(Query query,
                        int nResults)
                 throws ClientException
The back end to the different executeQuery calls

Specified by:
executeQuery in interface QueryExecutionIF
Parameters:
s - the query string
nResults - limit of initial results (after this hitting getnext is required)
queryType - the type of the query (QueryType object fields)
attr - the string to be sent to the server determing the type of the execution
Returns:
the id of the query in the registry
Throws:
ClientException
